LanguageData.HydraulicSpine.label: hydraulic spine
LanguageData.HydraulicSpine.description: Simple piston powered prosthesis made to reinforce a damaged spine. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
LanguageData.HydraulicLeg.label: hydraulic leg
LanguageData.HydraulicLeg.description: Simple piston powered prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
LanguageData.HydraulicArm.label: hydraulic arm
LanguageData.HydraulicArm.description: Simple but durable arm piston powered prosthesis.
LanguageData.CrudeProsthethicEye.label: light-sensitive eye prosthethic
LanguageData.CrudeProsthethicEye.description: A primitive electronic eye prosthethic. Only detects shifts in light intensity.
LanguageData.SimpleProsthethicEye.label: monochrome eye prosthethic
LanguageData.SimpleProsthethicEye.description: A crude electronic eye prosthethic. Only displays images in monochrome.
LanguageData.ColorProsthethicEye.label: trichrome eye prosthethic
LanguageData.ColorProsthethicEye.description: A simple electronic eye prosthethic. Creates images in the three primary color spectra.
LanguageData.HDProsthethicEye.label: high-definition trichromatic eye prosthethic
LanguageData.HDProsthethicEye.description: A advanced electronic eye prosthethic. Creates high-definition full color images.
LanguageData.SharpShooter.label: Sharpshooter Implant
LanguageData.SharpShooter.description: A specialized bionic eye replacement that improves skills with ranged weapons by adding reticule overlays and zoom capability.
